sentences.en: A micrometer is one thousandth of one millimeter.
sentences.cn: 一微米是一毫米的千分之一。

sentences.en: Each channel is less than a tenth of a millimeter wide.
sentences.cn: 每个通道的宽度小于十分之一毫米.

sentences.en: Gyroklystron is one of the most promising high - power coherent millimeter wave sources.
sentences.cn: 回旋速调管放大器是一种具有重要发展前景的高功率相干毫米波源.

sentences.en: I commonly use the Olympus 100 millimeter telephoto lens.
sentences.cn: i普遍使用奥林巴斯100毫米远摄镜头.

sentences.en: In the back of the truck was a 12.7 millimeter rapid-fire machine gun.
sentences.cn: 在卡车后面有一只12.7毫米口径的速射机关枪。

sentences.en: It used materials is 0.4 millimeter stainless steel spring steel of powder coatings.
sentences.cn: 它使用的材料是0.4毫米的不锈钢弹簧钢，粉末涂层。

sentences.en: Micrometre: One - thousandth of a millimeter.
sentences.cn: 微米: 百万分之一米.

sentences.en: Microwave signal generator FenMiBo until millimeter wave bands from the signal generator.
sentences.cn: 微波信号发生器从分米波直到毫米波波段的信号发生器.

sentences.en: Millimeter is used as length unit in this drawing unless otherwise noted.
sentences.cn: 除非另有注明,本图采用毫米为长度单位.

sentences.en: On average these mosses grow at the glacial speed of 1 millimeter per year—and some of the turfs are meters thick.
sentences.cn: 平均来说，这些苔藓以每年大约1毫米的极慢速度生长，而某些草皮有数米厚。

sentences.en: Our store doesn't make even a millimeter's mistake in cutting cloth.
sentences.cn: 本店扯布,分厘不差.

sentences.en: Snow city Washington, annual snowfall amounts to 1870 millimeter.
sentences.cn: 雪城华盛顿, 每年降雪量达1870毫米.

sentences.en: So the target echo of armor of millimeter wave is very important.
sentences.cn: 因而对装甲目的的毫米波回波特性的研讨拥有十分主要的意思.

sentences.en: The phone will use a tiny chip measuring less than one millimeter to detect unpleasant odors, a spokes- woman for Siemens Mobile said.
sentences.cn: 西门子移动动电话公司的一位女发言人说，这种电话用不到一毫米的微小芯片来检测令人不悦的气味。

sentences.en: The silicon chips are less than a millimeter thick.
sentences.cn: 这些硅片厚度不足一毫米.

sentences.en: The system's antenna emits a focused beam of millimeter wave energy.
sentences.cn: 该系统的天线发射出能量为毫米波的聚焦射束.

sentences.en: The technology of millimeter wave guidance is still in its infancy now.
sentences.cn: 译文:毫米波制导技术目前才刚刚起步.

sentences.en: This thesis mainly discusses the millimeter - wave fin - line PIN diode SPDT.
sentences.cn: 本课题主要研究的是毫米波鳍线PIN管单刀双掷开关.

sentences.en: To solve the problem of poor resolution in passive millimeter wave(PMMW) imaging, we present an improved maximum a posteriori(MAP) super-resolution algorithm.
sentences.cn: 针对无源毫米波成像中图像分辨率低的问题，提出了一种改进的最大后验（MAP）超分辨算法。

sentences.en: Vane - radiator is an ideal cooling device for beam millimeter - wave traveling wave tube.
sentences.cn: 翼片式散热器是一种符合设计要求的理想散热结构.

sentences.en: We're also good at seeing big clouds of small particles of dust. ... But in between dust grains up to a millimeter in size and the smallest planets we can see, we're blind.
sentences.cn: 我们也同样擅长于发现那些一大堆的尘埃...但是如果要去发现那些毫米级的尘埃，和那些我们能看到的最小的行星，我们几乎就成了盲人。

trans.tran_en: a unit for measuring length. There are 1,000 millimeters in one meter.
